page.title: 08LEISURE IN MINSTERLEY
page.content: Minsterley is a small village but there always seems to be lots to do.You never get bored. In the countryside around Minsterley you can go{fishing, {birdwatching, rambling & cycling. You can play on the playing field on the{swings & play football. At school there is a{chess club, a{choir & a swimming club. There is the church{lads' & {girls' brigade, Sunday School, scouts, {cubs, brownies, tennis & bowling. You can go to town or on bus {trips. Every year there is an{Eisteddfod & an{agricultural show}in Minsterley. There is{T.V.}to watch &{games}to play.
